title: Discover the stunning makeover of Huntington Tri-state Airport in MSFS!
description:
This week, numerous US airports have received updates, including the Tri-State Airport, also referred to as Huntington Tri-State Airport. This airport accommodates commercial airlines, air cargo, military, and general aviation traffic. With two major airlines, HTS offers several non-stop destinations. The recent improvements have significantly enhanced the airport's facilities.

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
https://youtu.be/Hb1YFrFJpTM
